original_text: You will be like a man who has drunk too much alcohol. And you will try to hide. You will try to get help from your enemy.
korean_text: 너도 술에 취하여 숨으리라 너도 원수들 때문에 피난처를 찾으리라

sentences.original_text: You will be like a man
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 한 사람과 같이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: who has drunk too much alcohol
sentences.korean_translation: 너무 많은 술을 마신 사람처럼 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: And you will try to hide
You will try to get help
